document.full_text: a southern california woman has been charged with murder after police found her wheeling around a trash barrel filled with dirt and the partial remains of her slain boyfriend, authorities said on thursday.
document.title: murder victim's remains found in trash can and flower pots
lines_and_colors: a southern california woman has been charged with murder after police found her wheeling around a trash barrel filled with dirt and the partial remains of her slain boyfriend, authorities said on thursday.
